thread.section_title: The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great alternative to the big hotels
thread.title_full: Great alternative to the big hotels - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Craig M
title: Great alternative to the big hotels
text: Great location and staff. Tucked off 40th but easy to get to the mid-town area. The hotel has that small, kind off European feel to it. Staff couldn't have been better. The attached restaurant was full of non guest, local patrons which was an indication that it was something special which it was. Not over the top price wise and quality dining. I could see myself eating there even if I wasn't staying at the hotel.
